exceptions.tactic: pose (ad_SF_val_fun f a b n) as H_ad.
exceptions.exn: The reference ad_SF_val_fun was not found in the current environment.

original: case (Rle_dec a b). - intros H. pose (ad_SF_val_fun f a b n) as H_ad. destruct H_ad as [H_adapted _]. specialize (H_adapted H). apply StepFun_P1 in H_adapted. unfold subdivision_val. rewrite (StepFun_P1 a b (sf_SF_val_fun f a b n)). rewrite (SF_val_subdiv f a b n). auto. - intros H. pose (ad_SF_val_fun f a b n) as H_ad. destruct H_ad as [_ H_adapted]. specialize (H_adapted H). apply StepFun_P1 in H_adapted. unfold subdivision_val. rewrite (StepFun_P1 a b (sf_SF_val_fun f b a n)). rewrite (SF_val_subdiv f b a n). auto.
